Package org.mvplugins.multiverse.core.config.handle

Class FileConfigurationHandle<C extends org.bukkit.configuration.file.FileConfiguration>

java.lang.Object
org.mvplugins.multiverse.core.config.handle.BaseConfigurationHandle<C>
org.mvplugins.multiverse.core.config.handle.FileConfigurationHandle<C>
Type Parameters:
C - The configuration type.
Direct Known Subclasses:
CommentedConfigurationHandle, YamlConfigurationHandle
public abstract class FileConfigurationHandle<C extends org.bukkit.configuration.file.FileConfiguration> extends BaseConfigurationHandle<C>
Generic configuration handle for file based configurations.
